meanings.definition: Form a mental image of something
meanings.sent1: I can visualize the beach with white sand and blue water.
meanings.sent2: Close your eyes and visualize a big red apple in your mind.
meanings.sent3: I tried to visualize a purple elephant wearing sunglasses!
meanings.sent4: She could visualize her success as a bright, shining star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Try to visualize the concept of time as a flowing river.

meanings.definition: Imagine seeing something in one's mind
meanings.sent1: When I close my eyes, I can visualize a rainbow in my mind.
meanings.sent2: Children often visualize magical creatures when they play pretend.
meanings.sent3: I tried to visualize a talking banana, but it just made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were so vivid, she could visualize them like a movie playing in her head.
meanings.sent5: Visualize your favorite place to relax and destress after a long day.

meanings.definition: Make something visible to the mind or imagination
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting can help you visualize a peaceful meadow.
meanings.sent2: Reading a good book can help you visualize the story unfolding in your mind.
meanings.sent3: I tried to visualize a flying pig, but it just seemed silly.
meanings.sent4: Her words were so powerful, they could visualize a world of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: Visualize yourself achieving your goals and making your dreams come true.
